content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 4362021 the case was heard by the supreme court of the republic of slovenia on december 1 2021 the text mentions a cost procedure and a first instance judgment but does not provide details about them the supreme court became involved but the specific matter being appealed is not mentioned the text concludes with a mention of compensation but it is unclear who is receiving it or for what reason the legal procedure lasted until december 1 2022 the final resolution states that the purchase price of goods was 90000 eur and the restaurant rent was 8650 eur the applicant received funds from the defendants bank accounts the division of assets was determined to be 50 for the plaintiff and 50 for the defendant the supreme court allowed a revision regarding the establishment of shares in coowned property the court used the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act to make a decision the court of first instance made a mistake in applying article 59 of the marriage family relations act the court determined that a restaurant called a purchased a property with marriage party proceeds the defendant received the purchase price and the applicant received rent the court found that funds from a car and bank accounts belonged to both parties and should be divided equally the defendant appealed and the court of second instance partially amended the ruling the court of first instance increased the defendants share of coowned property to 60 the defendant is now appealing to the supreme court claiming errors in interpreting laws and procedural irregularities the supreme court has referred the case to a chamber for further consideration

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 436/2021, 1. 12. 2021
